fields.name: 0.5 Assertion
fields.description: The 0.5 version of the Open Badges specification instructed issuers to bake a link into a badge, which would point to a hosted assertion that had nested badge and issuer information.

fields.name: 1.0 Backpack misbake
fields.description: From late 2013 to late 2014, the Mozilla backpack was baking an internal normalized representation of badges into images sent through the Issuer API instead of the original assertions. Consumers should fetch the original assertion and analyze it, as opposed to the misbaked backpack version of that data.

fields.name: 1.0 Open Badge
fields.description: 1.0 compliant badges have an Assertion baked into the image file that links to a BadgeClass. The BadgeClass links to the Issuer file.

fields.name: 1.1 Open Badge
fields.description: 1.1 Open Badges are backwards compatible with 1.0 badges, but also require JSON-LD @context and @type, and allow badge extensions.

fields.schema_json: {"oneOf":[{"required":["recipient"],"type":"object","description":"Hashed and salted recipient identity. As updated March 2012","properties":{"recipient":{"$ref":"#/definitions/HashString"},"salt":{"type":"string"}}},{"required":["recipient"],"type":"object","description":"Unobscured plaintext email address of recipient identity. Original as of Fall 2011","properties":{"recipient":{"type":"string","format":"email"}}}],"description":"An amalgam of 0.5.0 OBI specifications mandates that the assertion be an object with embedded badge and issuer properties.","title":"0.5 Badge Assertion","allOf":[{"additionalProperties":true,"required":["badge"],"type":"object","description":"Characteristics shared between late 2011 and early 2012 iterations of the 0.5.0 Open Badges specification","properties":{"badge":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BadgeObject"},"expires":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"issued_on":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"evidence":{"type":"string","format":"uri"}}}],"definitions":{"UNIXTimeStamp":{"oneOf":[{"minimum":0,"type":"integer","maximum":9999999999},{"pattern":"^\\d{10}$","type":"string"}],"description":"10-digit UNIX timestamp, epoch time"},"HashString":{"oneOf":[{"pattern":"^sha1\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-1 Hash"},{"pattern":"^sha256\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-256 Hash"},{"pattern":"^md5\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{32}$","title":"Open Badges MD5 Hash"}],"allOf":[{"type":"string"}]},"DateTime":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ISODateTime"},{"$ref":"#/definitions/UNIXTimeStamp"}]},"BadgeObject":{"required":["name","image","description","criteria","issuer"],"type":"object","description":"an object describing the achievement earned by the recipient of the assertion.","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the badge being issued. Maximum of 128 characters."},"image":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the badge being issued."},"version":{"pattern":"0\\.5\\.0","type":"string","description":"The version of the OBI specification used. 0.5.0 in this case."},"criteria":{"type":"string","description":"URL describing the badge and criteria for earning the badge (Not the specific instance of the badge).","format":"uri"},"issuer":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Issuer"}}},"ISODateTime":{"pattern":"^\\d{4}-[01]\\d-[0-3]\\d(T[0-2]\\d:[0-5]\\d(:[0-5]\\d)?([\\.,]\\d{1,3})?(Z|[+-][0-2]\\d(:?[0-5]\\d)?)?)?$","type":"string","description":"ISO 8601 date format string yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS with optional time, perhaps even with .SSS milliseconds"},"Issuer":{"required":["origin","name"],"type":"object","description":"Information about the issuer.","properties":{"origin":{"type":"string","description":"Origin of the issuer. This is the <protocol>://<host>:<port>. Must match the origin of the hosted assertion (and in the future, the origin of the public key).","format":"uri"},"org":{"type":"string","description":"(OPTIONAL) Organization for which the badge is being issued."},"contact":{"type":"string","description":"(OPTIONAL) A human-monitored email address associated with the issuer.","format":"email"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the issuing agent."}}}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"}

{"description":"The backpack was doing something weird for a while and baking its own internal understanding of a badge instead of the original assertion. This includes some 1.0 properties and some deprecated 0.5 properties","title":"Backpack-manipulated franken-assertion made from a valid 1.0 or 0.5 badge","required":["uid","recipient","badge","verify","issued_on"],"id":"http://openbadges.org/schema/backpack-error","additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"VerificationObject":{"required":["type"],"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"type":{"enum":["hosted","signed"],"type":"string","title":"VerificationType"}}},"UNIXTimeStamp":{"oneOf":[{"minimum":0,"type":"integer","maximum":9999999999},{"pattern":"^\\d{10}$","type":"string"}],"description":"10-digit UNIX timestamp, epoch time"},"HashString":{"oneOf":[{"pattern":"^sha1\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-1 Hash"},{"pattern":"^sha256\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-256 Hash"}],"allOf":[{"type":"string"}]},"IdentityType":{"enum":["email"],"type":"string"},"IdentityObject":{"required":["identity","type","hashed"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityType"},"salt":{"type":"string"},"hashed":{"type":"boolean"},"identity":{"oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/HashString"},{"type":"string","format":"email"}]}},"title":"Badge Identity Object"},"DateTime":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ISODateTime"},{"$ref":"#/definitions/UNIXTimeStamp"}]},"ISODateTime":{"pattern":"^\\d{4}-[01]\\d-[0-3]\\d(T[0-2]\\d:[0-5]\\d(:[0-5]\\d)?([\\.,]\\d{1,3})?(Z|[+-][0-2]\\d(:?[0-5]\\d)?)?)?$","type":"string","description":"ISO 8601 date format string yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS with optional .SSS milliseconds"},"BadgeObject":{"required":["name","image","description","criteria","issuer","_location"],"type":"object","description":"an object describing the achievement earned by the recipient of the assertion.","properties":{"_location":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the badge being issued. Maximum of 128 characters."},"image":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"Description of the badge being issued."},"criteria":{"type":"string","description":"URL describing the badge and criteria for earning the badge (Not the specific instance of the badge).","format":"uri"},"issuer":{"$ref":"#/definitions/Issuer"}}},"Issuer":{"required":["origin","name","_location"],"type":"object","description":"Information about the issuer.","properties":{"origin":{"type":"string","description":"Origin of the issuer. This is the <protocol>://<host>:<port>. Must match the origin of the hosted assertion (and in the future, the origin of the public key).","format":"uri"},"_location":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the issuing agent."},"url":{"type":"string","format":"url"},"contact":{"type":"string","description":"(OPTIONAL) A human-monitored email address associated with the issuer.","format":"email"},"org":{"type":"string","description":"(OPTIONAL) Organization for which the badge is being issued."}}}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"uid":{"type":"string"},"_originalRecipient":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityObject"},"expires":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"issued_on":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"evidence":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"verify":{"$ref":"#/definitions/VerificationObject"},"badge":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BadgeObject"}}}

{"description":"The 1.0 OBI specification mandates that the baked assertion be an object with linked Badge Class","title":"1.0-compliant assertion w/linked Badge Class","required":["uid","recipient","badge","verify","issuedOn"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"VerificationObject":{"required":["type"],"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"type":{"enum":["hosted","signed"],"type":"string","title":"VerificationType"}}},"UNIXTimeStamp":{"minimum":0,"type":"integer","description":"10-digit UNIX timestamp, epoch time","maximum":9999999999},"HashString":{"oneOf":[{"pattern":"^sha1\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-1 Hash"},{"pattern":"^sha256\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-256 Hash"}],"allOf":[{"type":"string"}]},"IdentityType":{"enum":["email"],"type":"string"},"IdentityObject":{"required":["identity","type","hashed"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityType"},"salt":{"type":"string"},"hashed":{"type":"boolean"},"identity":{"oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/HashString"},{"type":"string","format":"email"}]}},"title":"Badge Identity Object"},"DateTime":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ISODateTime"},{"$ref":"#/definitions/UNIXTimeStamp"}]},"ISODateTime":{"pattern":"^\\d{4}-[01]\\d-[0-3]\\d(T[0-2]\\d:[0-5]\\d(:[0-5]\\d)?([\\.,]\\d{1,3})?(Z|[+-][0-2]\\d(:?[0-5]\\d)?)?)?$","type":"string","description":"ISO 8601 date format string yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS with optional .SSS milliseconds"}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"issuedOn":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"uid":{"type":"string"},"verify":{"$ref":"#/definitions/VerificationObject"},"expires":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"evidence":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"badge":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"recipient":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityObject"}}}

{"description":"The 1.0 OBI specification mandates that a hosted Badge Class be an object with linked Issuer","title":"1.0-compliant Badge Class with linked Issuer","required":["name","description","image","criteria","issuer"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"AlignmentObject":{"required":["name","url"],"type":"object","description":"Each object in an alignment array is an object that describes a particular standard or standard element and provides an appropriate link","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}}},"BadgeImage":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ImageDataUrl"},{"type":"string","format":"uri"}]},"AlignmentArray":{"items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AlignmentObject"},"type":"array","description":"List of objects describing which educational standards this badge aligns to, if any, and linking to the appropriate standard."},"ImageDataUrl":{"pattern":"^data:","type":"string"},"TagsArray":{"items":{"type":"string"},"uniqueness":true,"type":"array","description":"An array of strings. TagsArray is not a controlled vocabulary; it's a folksonomy"}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"},"tags":{"$ref":"#/definitions/TagsArray"},"image":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BadgeImage"},"criteria":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"issuer":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"alignment":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AlignmentArray"},"name":{"type":"string"}}}

{"description":"The 1.0 OBI specification mandates that the issuer be an object linked from the Badge Class. Only a name and url are required.","title":"1.0-compliant assertion w/linked Badge Class","required":["name","url"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"BadgeImage":{"oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ImageDataUrl"},{"type":"string","format":"uri"}]},"ImageDataUrl":{"pattern":"^data:","type":"string"}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"revocationList":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the issuing entity."},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"}}}

{"description":"The 1.1 OBI specification mandates that the baked assertion be an object with linked Badge Class and that JSON-LD context and type declarations be present","title":"1.1-compliant assertion w/linked Badge Class","required":["@context","@type","uid","recipient","badge","verify","issuedOn"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"VerificationObject":{"required":["type"],"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"type":{"enum":["hosted","signed"],"type":"string","title":"VerificationType"}}},"UNIXTimeStamp":{"minimum":0,"type":"integer","description":"10-digit UNIX timestamp, epoch time","maximum":9999999999},"JsonLdType":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}],"description":"A type or an array of types that the badge object represents. The first or only item should be 'assertion', and any others should each be an IRI (usually a URL) corresponding to a definition of the type itself. In almost all cases, an assertion will only have one type: 'assertion'"},"HashString":{"oneOf":[{"pattern":"^sha1\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-1 Hash"},{"pattern":"^sha256\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-256 Hash"}],"allOf":[{"type":"string"}]},"JsonLdContext":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string","format":"uri"},{"items":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"object"}]},"type":"array"}],"description":"A link to a valid JSON-LD context file, that maps term names to contexts. Open Badges contexts may also define JSON-schema to validate Badge Objects against. In an Open Badges Object, this will almost always be a string:uri to a single context file, but might rarely be an array of links instead. This schema also allows direct mapping of terms to IRIs by using an object as an option within an array"},"IdentityObject":{"required":["identity","type","hashed"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityType"},"salt":{"type":"string"},"hashed":{"type":"boolean"},"identity":{"oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/HashString"},{"type":"string","format":"email"}]}},"title":"Badge Identity Object"},"DateTime":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ISODateTime"},{"$ref":"#/definitions/UNIXTimeStamp"}]},"ISODateTime":{"pattern":"^\\d{4}-[01]\\d-[0-3]\\d(T[0-2]\\d:[0-5]\\d(:[0-5]\\d)?([\\.,]\\d{1,3})?(Z|[+-][0-2]\\d(:?[0-5]\\d)?)?)?$","type":"string","description":"ISO 8601 date format string yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS with optional .SSS milliseconds"},"IdentityType":{"enum":["email"],"type":"string"}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"issuedOn":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"uid":{"type":"string"},"verify":{"$ref":"#/definitions/VerificationObject"},"expires":{"$ref":"#/definitions/DateTime"},"evidence":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"badge":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"@context":{"$ref":"#/definitions/JsonLdContext"},"recipient":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityObject"},"@type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/JsonLdType"}}}

{"description":"The 1.1 OBI specification mandates that a hosted Badge Class be a valid JSON-LD object with linked Issuer","title":"1.1-compliant Badge Class with linked Issuer","required":["name","description","image","criteria","issuer"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"AlignmentObject":{"required":["name","url"],"type":"object","description":"Each object in an alignment array is an object that describes a particular standard or standard element and provides an appropriate link","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}}},"JsonLdType":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}],"description":"A type or an array of types that the badge object represents. The first or only item should be 'badgeclass', and any others should each be an IRI (usually a URL) corresponding to a definition of the type itself. In almost all cases, an assertion will only have one type: 'badgeclass'"},"JsonLdContext":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string","format":"uri"},{"items":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"object"}]},"type":"array"}],"description":"A link to a valid JSON-LD context file, that maps term names to contexts. Open Badges contexts may also define JSON-schema to validate Badge Objects against. In an Open Badges Object, this will almost always be a string:uri to a single context file, but might rarely be an array of links instead. This schema also allows direct mapping of terms to IRIs by using an object as an option within an array"},"ImageDataUrl":{"pattern":"^data:","type":"string"},"BadgeImage":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ImageDataUrl"},{"type":"string","format":"uri"}]},"AlignmentArray":{"items":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AlignmentObject"},"type":"array","description":"List of objects describing which educational standards this badge aligns to, if any, and linking to the appropriate standard."},"TagsArray":{"items":{"type":"string"},"uniqueness":true,"type":"array","description":"An array of strings. TagsArray is not a controlled vocabulary; it's a folksonomy"}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string"},"tags":{"$ref":"#/definitions/TagsArray"},"image":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BadgeImage"},"name":{"type":"string"},"criteria":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"@context":{"$ref":"#/definitions/JsonLdContext"},"@type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/JsonLdType"},"alignment":{"$ref":"#/definitions/AlignmentArray"},"issuer":{"type":"string","format":"uri"}}}

{"description":"The 1.1-compliant Open Badges Issuer definition file is a JSON-LD enabled version of the 1.0 version.","title":"1.1 Open Badges Issuer","required":["name","url"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"VerificationObject":{"required":["type"],"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"type":{"enum":["hosted","signed"],"type":"string","title":"VerificationType"}}},"UNIXTimeStamp":{"minimum":0,"type":"integer","description":"10-digit UNIX timestamp, epoch time","maximum":9999999999},"JsonLdType":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}],"description":"A type or an array of types that the badge object represents. The first or only item should be 'issuerorg', and any others should each be an IRI (usually a URL) corresponding to a definition of the type itself. In almost all cases, an assertion will only have one type: 'issuerorg'"},"HashString":{"oneOf":[{"pattern":"^sha1\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-1 Hash"},{"pattern":"^sha256\\$[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$","title":"Open Badges SHA-256 Hash"}],"allOf":[{"type":"string"}]},"JsonLdContext":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string","format":"uri"},{"items":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"object"}]},"type":"array"}],"description":"A link to a valid JSON-LD context file, that maps term names to contexts. Open Badges contexts may also define JSON-schema to validate Badge Objects against. In an Open Badges Object, this will almost always be a string:uri to a single context file, but might rarely be an array of links instead. This schema also allows direct mapping of terms to IRIs by using an object as an option within an array"},"IdentityObject":{"required":["identity","type","hashed"],"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/IdentityType"},"salt":{"type":"string"},"hashed":{"type":"boolean"},"identity":{"oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/HashString"},{"type":"string","format":"email"}]}},"title":"Badge Identity Object"},"ImageDataUrl":{"pattern":"^data:","type":"string"},"DateTime":{"anyOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ISODateTime"},{"$ref":"#/definitions/UNIXTimeStamp"}]},"BadgeImage":{"oneOf":[{"$ref":"#/definitions/ImageDataUrl"},{"type":"string","format":"uri"}],"description":"An image representative of the entity"},"ISODateTime":{"pattern":"^\\d{4}-[01]\\d-[0-3]\\dT[0-2]\\d:[0-5]\\d((.|,)\\d{1,3})?(Z|[+-][0-2]\\d(:?[0-5]\\d)?)$","type":"string","description":"ISO 8601 date format string yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS with optional .SSS milliseconds"},"IdentityType":{"enum":["email"],"type":"string"}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"description":{"type":"string","description":"A text description of the issuing organization"},"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"image":{"$ref":"#/definitions/BadgeImage"},"revocationList":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"name":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable name of the issuing entity"}}}

{"description":"The 1.1 OBI Standard allows extensions, as JSON-LD objects embedded in one of the standard Badge Objects (Issuer, Badge Class, or Assertion). 1.1 extensions should validate against this schema and any schema defined in the extension's JSON-LD context.","title":"1.1 Open Badge Extension - Core Schema","required":["@context","@type"],"additionalProperties":true,"definitions":{"JsonLdContext":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string","format":"uri"},{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}],"description":"A link to a valid JSON-LD context file, that maps term names to contexts. Open Badges contexts may also define JSON-schema to validate Badge Objects against. In an Open Badges Extension, this will almost always be a string:uri to a single context file, but might rarely be an array of links instead. Direct insertion of JSON-LD term mappings as a dictionary/object is not permitted in an OBI extension"},"JsonLdType":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"}],"description":"An array of types that the extension represents. The first item should be 'extension', and the second should be an IRI (usually URL) corresponding to a definition of the extension itself. For extensions using the Open Badges Standard extension registry, you may use the 'extension:YourExtension' shorthand, where 'YourExtension' is replaced by the name of the extension registered with the Open Badges Standard."}},"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"@context":{"$ref":"#/definitions/JsonLdContext"},"@type":{"$ref":"#/definitions/JsonLdType"}}}
